trans-unit.source: Report the specifics of a value change involving a <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 报告的值更改涉及细节<xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This is used as a parameter in <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged*> overrides.
trans-unit.target: 使用这种方式中的参数<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged*>重写。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged*>

trans-unit.source: This class parallels some of the members <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs> class, which is used to report event data for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged>, but the two classes serve different purposes.
trans-unit.target: 此类中指的某些成员<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs>类，该类用于报告的事件数据<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged>，但两个类用于不同的目的。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged> </xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: SizeChangedInfo is specifically used for <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A> overrides, which offers class handling for an event that is not exposed as a public event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: SizeChangedInfo 是专门用于<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>重写，它可以提供类处理未公开为中的公共事件的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details, see <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnRenderSizeChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: For the two Boolean parameters, note that you should report these as `true` only if the changes in the value are significant to rendering, or should interpret the values as such if reading existing values.
trans-unit.target: 注意，对于两个布尔参数，你应报告这些项目称为`true`只有中值的更改对呈现，是有意义，或如果读取现有的值应解释这种情况下的值。

trans-unit.source: Minor changes in the size values are possible due to precision side-effects, particularly when mathematical functions are applied to the double values.
trans-unit.target: 特别数学函数应用到双精度值，大小值中的小变动还可能由于精度副作用。

trans-unit.source: The element where the size is being changed.
trans-unit.target: 更改大小的元素。

trans-unit.source: The previous size, before the change.
trans-unit.target: 先前的大小，在更改之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Width component of the size changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果更改大小的宽度分量。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Height component of the size changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果更改大小的高度分量。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <xref href="System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo"></xref> reports a size change that includes a significant change to the Height component.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo"></xref>报告包括到高度组件显著的更改的大小更改。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only, and can only be set in the initial <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的并且只能在初始设置<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is a significant Height component change; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果没有显著的高度组件更改;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the new size being reported.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在报告的新大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only, and can only be set through the initial <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的并且只能通过初始设置<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>

trans-unit.source: The new size.
trans-unit.target: 新的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous size of the size-related value being reported as changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在报告为已更改的大小相关值的上一个大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only, and cannot be set by any direct means, it is being reported from an actual value on some instance.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的并且不能通过任何直接的方式设置，它是正在报告的实际值在某些实例上。

trans-unit.source: The previous size.
trans-unit.target: 先前的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that declares whether the Width component of the size changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，声明大小的宽度组件是否更改。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only, and can only be set through the initial <xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的并且只能通过初始设置<xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>构造函数。</xref:System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the width changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果宽度更改;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
